title: Neuro Evaluation FAQ
description: Evaluation FAQs without rankings or endorsements.
main_html:
If you only read one thing:

Before scheduling testing, confirm credentials, evaluation scope, report deliverables, and timeline in writing.

FAQ

Neuro evaluation FAQs

Neutral answers to common questions. No rankings. Educational only; not medical advice.

%%AD:global_faq_mid%%
%%FAQ_ITEMS_GLOBAL%%

Pre-Booking Decision Framework: Quick checklist before you schedule

  • Verify credentials and licensure using official sources.
  • Get it in writing: scope, deliverables, and turnaround time.
  • Clarify privacy. Ask who receives the report and how records are stored.
%%AD:global_faq_bottom%%

Why this matters: clear scope and deliverables reduce repeat testing and delays.
